mapper.select: SELECT 'ALL' AS CATEGORY ,COUNT(*) AS TOTAL FROM DP_ADV_ADMIN_NOTICE UNION ALL SELECT CATEGORY ,COUNT(*) AS TOTAL FROM DP_ADV_ADMIN_NOTICE GROUP BY CATEGORY

SELECT DEPT_TOTAL FROM ( SELECT A.DEPT_CODE ,COUNT(A.DEPT_CODE) AS DEPT_TOTAL FROM DP_ADV_AGENT A WHERE IS_ADMIN = 'N' GROUP BY A.DEPT_CODE )AA INNER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT DEPT_CODE FROM DP_ADV_DEPT WHERE DEPTH = '4' AND COMPANY_CODE = #{companyCode}) B ON AA.DEPT_CODE = B.DEPT_CODE WHERE AA.DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode}
SELECT DEPT_CODE ,DEPT_NAME ,P_DEPT_CODE ,DEPTH ,COMPANY_CODE FROM DP_ADV_DEPT WHERE COMPANY_CODE = #{companyCode} ORDER BY DEPTH
